wikipedia_page.main: Sir Damon Marcus Buffini (born 1962) is a British businessman and governor of the Wellcome Trust. He was formerly head of the private equity company Permira.

response: In business, Damon Buffini heads Permira, one of the world's largest private equity firms. He topped the 2007 Powerlist as the most powerful Black male in the United Kingdom by New Nation magazine and was appointed to then Prime Minister Gordon Brown's business advisory panel.
* Sir Damon Buffini, head of private equity firm Permira
* Sir Damon Buffini – former managing partner, Permira; Governor, the Wellcome Trust foundation.
Fairbridge's patron was Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy, its president was Damon Buffini and
